Material used.Description: Dicer knockout mice were transfected with the luciferase reporter construct.

Readout description.Result Description: Increased luciferase activity was observed in dLRRK(I1915T) mutant cells compared to wild-type.
Increased luciferase activity was observed in hLRRK2(G2019S) mutant cells compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed for each variant.

Technical replicates.Description: No technical replicates were included in this study.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type luciferase construct was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative controls were included in this study.

Validation controls P/LP.Counts: Two pathogenic variants were validated for expression levels.

Validation controls B/LB.Counts: One benign variant was included as a control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: No statistical analysis was performed in this study.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Luciferase activity greater than 2.5 units on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Luciferase activity less than 1.0 unit on day 7.
